00022 #ifndef _DYNAMICARRAY_H
00023 #define _DYNAMICARRAY_H
00024 
00025 /* This defines the maximum size of node */
00026 
00027 typedef struct List {
00028         char *node;
00029         struct List* pNext;
00030 } List;
00031 
00032 
00033 int freeList(List** pHeadRef);
00034 int addNode(List** pHeadRef, void *newNode);
00035 int getLength(List* pList);
00036 int printList(List* pList);
00037 int appendNode(List** pHeadRef, void* newNode) ;
00038 int getNode(List* pList, int nodeNum, void* Node);
00039 int freeListNode(List** pHeadRef, int node);
00040

00047  * {
00048  *      List* pList = NULL;
00049  *      char *Node = NULL;
00050  *
00051  *      Node = (char *)malloc(MAXIMUM_NODE_SIZE);
00052  *      
00053  *      printf("\nAdding Node 1");
00054  *      appendNode(&pList, "Infosys"); 
00055  *
00056  *      printf("\nAdding Node 2");
00057  *      appendNode(&pList, "Boolean"); 
00058  *
00059  *      printf("\nAdding Node 3");
00060  *      appendNode(&pList, "Create Descriptor"); 
00061  *
00062  *      printList(pList);
00063  *      printf("\nList length = %d\n", getLength(pList));
00064  *
00065  *      getNode(pList, 3, Node);
00066  *      printf("\nNode obtained is = %s, Length = %d", Node, strlen(Node));
00067  *      printf("\n");
00068  *
